text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSPatientSummaryBody

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSPatientSummaryBody 0..*BasePatient summary body model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
alerts 1..1BaseSection: Alerts.
dataAbsentReason 0..1CodeableConceptReason for absence of data
medicalAlert 0..*EHDSAlertFlagDescription of medical alerts in textual format: any clinical information that is imperative to know so that the life or health of the patient does not come under threat.
allergiesAndIntolerances 1..1BaseSection: Allergies and intolerances
dataAbsentReason 0..1CodeableConceptReason for absence of data (indicates whether the person is known to have no allergies or the data is considered incomplete)
allergy 0..*EHDSAllergyIntoleranceAllergy or intolerance information
medicalHistory 0..1BaseSection: Medical History.
pastProblems 0..*EHDSConditionProblems or diagnoses that the patient suffered in the past, and which have been resolved, closed or declared as inactive (not included in current problems or diagnosis)
description 0..1stringNarrative description of past problems.
immunisations 0..1BaseSection: Immunisations.
vaccination 0..*EHDSImmunizationImmunizations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.
currentProblems 1..1BaseSection: Current medical problems.
dataAbsentReason 0..1CodeableConceptReason for absence of data
healthConditions 0..*EHDSConditionHealth conditions affecting the health of the patient.
medicalDevicesAndImplants 1..1BaseSection: Medical devices and implants
dataAbsentReason 0..1CodeableConceptReason for absence of data
medicalDevice 0..*EHDSDeviceUseDescribes the patient’s implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.
procedures 1..1BaseSection: Procedures
dataAbsentReason 0..1CodeableConceptReason for absence of data
procedure 0..*EHDSProcedureMajor procedures.
medicationSummary 1..1BaseSection: Medication Summary.
dataAbsentReason 0..1CodeableConceptReason for absence of data
medicationTreatment 0..*EHDSMedicationAdministrationMedication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.
functionalStatus 0..1BaseSection: Functional status
functionalStatusAssessment 0..*EHDSFunctionalStatusAn individual’s ability to perform normal daily activities required to meet basic needs, fulfil usual roles and maintain health and well-being
socialHistory 0..1BaseSection: Social history.
description 1..1stringTextual description of the social history.
observation 0..*EHDSObservationSocial history observations related to health
pregnancyHistory 0..1BaseSection: Pregnancy history
currentPregnancyStatus 0..1BaseCurrent pregnancy status
status 0..*EHDSObservationCurrent state at the date the observation was made: e.g. pregnant, not pregnant, unknown
expectedDateOfDelivery 0..1dateTimeExpected date of delivery
previousPregnancies 0..1BaseHistory of previous pregnancies
status 0..1EHDSObservationPrevious pregnancies status: Yes, previous pregnancies; No, previous pregnancies; Unknown
description 0..*BasePrevious pregnancy's descriptions in detail
outcome 0..1EHDSObservationOutcome of the pregnancy
numberOfChildren 0..1integerNumber of children/fetuses in this specific pregnancy
patientProvidedData 0..1BaseSection: Patient provided data
travelHistory 0..*Basecaptures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.
country 0..1CodeableConceptCountry code
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): ISO 3166

period 0..*PeriodDate of entry and departure
advanceDirectives 0..1BaseSection: Advance Directives.
documentation 0..*CodeableConceptMay take the form of a reference to a legal document (e.g., Living Will) or an external textual description.
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): SNOMED CT


results 0..1BaseSection: Observation results.
resultObservation[x] 0..*Observation results pertaining to the subject of care's health condition and which might have impact on future treatments
resultObservationEHDSObservationEHDSObservation
resultObservationEHDSLaboratoryObservationEHDSLaboratoryObservation
planOfCare 0..1BaseSection: Care plans.
description 0..1stringNarrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.
planOfCareEntry 0..*EHDSCarePlanDescribes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSPatientSummaryBody
title: Patient summary body model
description: EHDS model for Patient Summary body data elements

element.definition: EHDS model for Patient Summary body data elements
Information about substantial alerts or warnings that health professionals should be aware of.
Reason for absence of data

element.short: Description of medical alerts in textual format: any clinical information that is imperative to know so that the life or health of the patient does not come under threat.
element.definition: Description of medical alerts in textual format: any clinical information that is imperative to know so that the life or health of the patient does not come under threat.
Section: Allergies and intolerances

element.short: Reason for absence of data (indicates whether the person is known to have no allergies or the data is considered incomplete)
element.definition: Reason for absence of data (indicates whether the person is known to have no allergies or the data is considered incomplete)
Allergy or intolerance information

This section may provide both synthetic anamnesis (e.g. description of phases of the pathology as a chronological summary of clustered clinical information) and anecdotal evidence that clinicians can collect from the patient, and can read in a narrative form.

element.short: Problems or diagnoses that the patient suffered in the past, and which have been resolved, closed or declared as inactive (not included in current problems or diagnosis)
element.definition: Problems or diagnoses that the patient suffered in the past, and which have been resolved, closed or declared as inactive (not included in current problems or diagnosis)
Narrative description of past problems.

The primary purpose is to enable communication of a patient's immunization status. The section should include current immunization status and may contain the entire immunization history that is relevant to the period of time being summarized. Adverse reactions against vaccines should be documented in the allergy section.

element.short: Immunizations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.
element.definition: Immunizations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.
Conditions that are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter.
Reason for absence of data

element.short: Health conditions affecting the health of the patient.
element.definition: Health conditions affecting the health of the patient.
Section: Medical devices and implants
Reason for absence of data

element.short: Describes the patient’s implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.
element.definition: Describes the patient’s implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.
Section: Procedures
Reason for absence of data
Major procedures.
Current and relevant past medicine.
Reason for absence of data

element.short: Medication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.
element.definition: Medication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.
Section: Functional status

element.short: An individual’s ability to perform normal daily activities required to meet basic needs, fulfil usual roles and maintain health and well-being
element.definition: An individual’s ability to perform normal daily activities required to meet basic needs, fulfil usual roles and maintain health and well-being
Observations on social factors such as alcohol consumption or smoking. From the healthcare perspective, life-style factors relate to well-being but can also provide a source of risk factors.

element.short: Textual description of the social history.
element.definition: Textual description of the social history.

element.short: Social history observations related to health
element.definition: Health related lifestyle factors or lifestyle observations and social determinants of health. Example: cigarette smoker, alcohol consumption
Section: Pregnancy history
Current pregnancy status

element.short: Current state at the date the observation was made: e.g. pregnant, not pregnant, unknown
element.definition: Current state at the date the observation was made: e.g. pregnant, not pregnant, unknown
Date on which the woman is due to give birth.
History of previous pregnancies

element.short: Previous pregnancies status: Yes, previous pregnancies; No, previous pregnancies; Unknown
element.definition: Previous pregnancies status: Yes, previous pregnancies; No, previous pregnancies; Unknown
Previous pregnancy's descriptions in detail
Outcome of the pregnancy

element.short: Number of children/fetuses in this specific pregnancy
element.definition: Number of children/fetuses in this specific pregnancy
Section: Patient provided data

element.short: captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.
element.definition: captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.
Country code
Date of entry and departure
Provision for healthcare decisions if, in the future, a person is unable to make those decisions.

element.short: May take the form of a reference to a legal document (e.g., Living Will) or an external textual description.
element.definition: May take the form of a reference to a legal document (e.g., Living Will) or an external textual description.
Relevant observation results obtained on the patient. These may be measurements, laboratory results, anatomic pathology results, radiology results or other imaging or clinical results.

element.short: Observation results pertaining to the subject of care's health condition and which might have impact on future treatments
element.definition: Observation results pertaining to the subject of care's health condition and which might have impact on future treatments
Therapeutic recommendations that do not include pharmacologic treatments, such as diet, physical exercise, planned surgeries

element.short: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.
element.definition: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.

element.short: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.
element.definition: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.
